name: Big Chungus (rainbowdeb)
description:
Note:
Welcome to Big Chungus Game
Have fun playing it!

Recommended Requirements:

GT 1030
64 GB Ram (for better exp)

Slow Requirements:
macOS 10, Windows xp, Nintendo Switch, Android 3+
Inter Graphics
2 GB ram for Phones, 512 MB ram for nintendo switches, 6 GB for PCs
Inter processors

Readme.md:
I do not own the video. I just simply made this game because i made a 12 Hour version. Report any bugs on the comments!
